name: Proof
description: '''DeShaun Dupree Holton''' (October 2, 1973 â€“ April 11, 2006), known professionally as '''Proof''', was an American rapper from [[Detroit]], [[Michigan]]. During his career, he was a member of the groups 5 Elementz, Funky Cowboys, Promatic, Goon Sqwad, and [[D12]]. He was a close childhood friend of rapper [[Eminem]], who also lived in Detroit. Proof was often a [[hype man]] at Eminem's concerts.
